name: Canadian Tire
address: Canadian Tire, 2830 Bentall St, Vancouver, BC V5M 4H4

featured_reviews.review_id: The Garden Center at Canadian Tire this Year is Superb.  Better Prices and WAY more selection and variety than the Lowes and Home Depot close by. A shame Canadian Tire is associating itself with the Retail Failure London Drugs in a shared Flyer.  Makes me not look at it and throw it out.
featured_reviews.review_text: The Garden Center at Canadian Tire this Year is Superb.  Better Prices and WAY more selection and variety than the Lowes and Home Depot close by. A shame Canadian Tire is associating itself with the Retail Failure London Drugs in a shared Flyer.  Makes me not look at it and throw it out.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your fantastic review! We're delighted to hear that you had an excellent experience at our Garden Center. Providing a wide selection and variety of products at competitive prices is something we take pride in. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we're thrilled to know that we surpassed the offerings of other nearby stores. We appreciate your support and look forward to being your top choice for all your gardening needs. If there's anything else we can do to enhance your experience, please let us know. Nice photos... Happy gardening!

featured_reviews.review_id: I have to give a shout out to the parts department. The person working there had excellent mechanical knowledge of cars and had great customer service, I had a no start issue with my truck and it turn out his suggestion about the starter coils was correct. Especially since my Dodge dealership failed to understand the issue and find the fault. Also want to commend him for his patience with the number of customers requiring his help.
featured_reviews.review_text: I have to give a shout out to the parts department. The person working there had excellent mechanical knowledge of cars and had great customer service, I had a no start issue with my truck and it turn out his suggestion about the starter coils was correct. Especially since my Dodge dealership failed to understand the issue and find the fault. Also want to commend him for his patience with the number of customers requiring his help.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for the fantastic 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear about your positive experience with our parts department. It's great to know that our staff provided excellent mechanical knowledge and outstanding customer service. We're glad they were able to correctly diagnose and resolve the issue with your truck, especially when your Dodge dealership couldn't. We'll make sure to pass along your compliments and commendation for their patience. We're here to help, and your satisfaction is important to us. We look forward to serving you again in the future!

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id: Convenient location, just off the highway. At a major intersection yet Still provides plenty of parking spaces. The store is sprawling and spans three floors - not the easiest to navigate. The staff is efficient but with few members it is best to look things up yourself on the website.
featured_reviews.review_text: Convenient location, just off the highway. At a major intersection yet Still provides plenty of parking spaces. The store is sprawling and spans three floors - not the easiest to navigate. The staff is efficient but with few members it is best to look things up yourself on the website.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thanks for the rating Infinerdy. We hope to make your next visit a 4 or 5 star experience!

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id: Lots of parking, the store itself is organized chaos. There is stuff everywhere. The seasonal section changes frequently. If you are looking for something in particular, search their website first and check quantities for your location if they only have one. It's likely they don't have it. The people at the automotive parts counter can be helpful.
featured_reviews.review_text: Lots of parking, the store itself is organized chaos. There is stuff everywhere. The seasonal section changes frequently. If you are looking for something in particular, search their website first and check quantities for your location if they only have one. It's likely they don't have it. The people at the automotive parts counter can be helpful.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for the 4-star review and for sharing your feedback. We're glad you found the parking convenient and our automotive parts counter staff helpful. We'll work on improving store organization and better website inventory accuracy to enhance your shopping experience. Your input is valuable to us, and we look forward to serving you again.

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id: Very often you can get discounts on wheels in this store.Also, you don't have to wait long, you can register for literally the next day.The staff was polite and courteous.
featured_reviews.review_text: Very often you can get discounts on wheels in this store.Also, you don't have to wait long, you can register for literally the next day.The staff was polite and courteous.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for your kind words! We're delighted to hear you had a great experience with us. Providing discounts and prompt service is our priority, and we're pleased you noticed our polite and courteous staff. We look forward to serving you again soon!

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id: Awesome customer service and the supervisor at the key replacement booth saved my butt. They were able to duplicate 5 different keys (mailbox, pad locks, drawers) that the minutekey machine couldn't.
featured_reviews.review_text: Awesome customer service and the supervisor at the key replacement booth saved my butt. They were able to duplicate 5 different keys (mailbox, pad locks, drawers) that the minutekey machine couldn't.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
We're thrilled to hear about your positive experience! Our team takes pride in assisting customers like you, and we're glad we could help with your various key replacements. Thank you for your 5-star review, and we look forward to assisting you again in the future if needed.

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id:
I was doing tire rotation and inflation 2 days ago.
I asked for 37 psi for my tires where 33 is the factory's recommendation.
The counter also asked me the reason why I wanted to be 37 which was noted on the receipt. I answered my outer treads are lower and I have a heavy-duty to do.
I hadn't been told anything when my car was ready to pick up.
I found my tires were still 33 this morning as I felt my tires were so soft and called them, they replied they only did the factory's recommendation. I said I requested but nobody mentioned that when it finished. They said you could do it by yourself if you wanted to modify it.
I respect your standard for any reason, but something I requested and no one replied to that until I found it by myself.
(At least I have been told my tires could not be inflated up to 37 when I pay for my service. What do you think?)
Never come back with a robot service.
Not recommend.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
We apologize for the oversight during your recent tire service visit. Your feedback is important to us, and we regret that we didn't meet your expectations. The team should have communicated to you they are not prepared to inflate the tires above manufacturers recommendation. This was a mistake on our part, and we are truly sorry. 

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id:
Today's visit to this store was incredibly disappointing, to say the least. If I could rate it a 0, I certainly would. My husband and I stopped by to purchase some items, including supplies for his coworkers. We paid separately at the self-checkout, and my husband also exchanged a measuring tape, which he started using right away, given his construction outfit.

As we headed towards the exit on the first floor where we had parked our car, the security guard requested to see our receipts. We dutifully presented every single bill for all our purchases, even down to the 10 pens (which were just 50 cents each). Despite our cooperation, it seemed the security guard was not satisfied. He meticulously counted the pens and scrutinized the bills.

What baffled us was when he asked my husband to remove his jacket. We complied, revealing the six bills we had presented earlier, everything perfectly in order. He cited it as a company policy, but was it really necessary to ask about the jacket? Did they have to count the pens too? It felt excessive and, frankly, quite ridiculous.

We had just spent $100 in the store that day, but this experience was far from pleasant. We used to be regular customers, but today's incident was beyond embarrassing. It's frustrating when you consider the prevalent issue of theft, especially by homeless individuals, and it was clear we weren't the ones they should be concerned about. Regrettably, I have no intention of returning to this store. Their insistence on checking receipts has always been irksome, but today, they truly took it to another level.

Note: I can attach the bills here, in case you really want to double check.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Daniela

We are deeply sorry for the unpleasant experience you had during your recent visit to our store. Your feedback is important to us, and we take it seriously. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and frustration caused by the security check process.

We understand that the extensive scrutiny of your purchases and the request to remove your jacket were unnecessary and felt excessive. Our goal is to create a welcoming and positive shopping experience for our customers, and it's clear we fell short in this instance.

We value your patronage and are genuinely sorry that you no longer feel comfortable shopping at our store. We will review our security procedures and provide additional training to our staff to ensure that such incidents are avoided in the future.

Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we appreciate your understanding. If there is anything we can do to regain your trust or if you have any further comments or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly. 604-431-3570

CT Grandview Leadership Team
